text:
When you try to use the sendRedirect of HTTPServletResponse, for example,
response.sendRedirect("mailto:someone@someserver.com");, this is redirecting to:

http://theservername/mailto:someone@someserver.com
creator: armando@dotmarketing.com

text: Another i did not mention, and i tested it in tomcat 6.0.14 and works perfectly.
creator: armando@dotmarketing.com
markt@apache.org
text:
5.0.x is no longer supported. This issue has been fixed in 4.1.x, 5.5.x and 6.0.x.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 18147 ***
